name: Kombo King
description:
JOIN THE DISCORD!
https://discord.gg/fGj7fstTnh

Fight your enemies & score as many powerful combos as you can! Show off your fighting skill in this action-packed, intense fighting game. Kombo King is fast-paced, intense, and destructive!



Storyline: You play as Chi, the last of your warrior clan. The Sunless has destroyed and killed all of the clan members and your family. Now it’s payback time! You are on the path to redress the injustice , seek vengeance, and restore your clan to its former glory by defeating the Sunless one by one with your ultimate fighting skill. It’s mortal battle, the best fighter will win the fight!




FEATURES OF KOMBO KING:


-Action-packed, intense fighting game with many enemies and levels to conquer!

-Combine melee combinations for devastating blows!

-Many crazy and flashy fighting moves to unleash and decimate foes!

-Great arcade style graphics with high quality animations!

-Challenging foes who will try to take you down with everything they have!

-Responsive & smooth game controls!

-Immersive story with great dialogue and audio!

-Score multipliers for Combos!




Classic arcade games are making a comeback! Kombo King is a game that's inspired by most combat/fighting arcade games, but with a twist and turn into an enjoyable gaming experience.


It’s time to find quality games to play!Kombo King is enjoyable, has great graphics, animation, storyline, and smooth game control. Try Kombo King now and enjoy fighting mortal enemies whenever and wherever you are. Score combo after combo and see how high your score can get!
